casebody.data:
Gearns, Appellant, v. Bowery Sav. Bank, Respondent. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. May 4, 1891.) Appeal from jury term. Action by James J. Gearns, administrator, etc., against the Bowery Savings Bank. From a judgment entered on a verdict for defendant, plaintiff appeals.

Argued before Sedgwick, C. J., and McAdam, J.

Titus & Bowling, for appellant. Carlisle Norwood, for respondent. Per Curiam.

On account of a division of opinion of judges, the judgment is affirmed, with costs.
